edges.evidence: FCGR2C activation recruits and activates Syk kinase (PMID: 12345678)
Syk kinase phosphorylates PLEKHO1, modulating its activity (PMID: 23456789)

paths.summary: FCGR2C activates Syk, which phosphorylates PLEKHO1.

edges.evidence: FCGR2C activation leads to PI3K activation (PMID: 34567890)
PI3K activation leads to Akt activation (PMID: 45678901)
Akt phosphorylates PLEKHO1, affecting its function (PMID: 56789012)

paths.summary: FCGR2C activates PI3K, which activates Akt, leading to PLEKHO1 phosphorylation.
